subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester United will enter 2013 with a 7-point lead in the Premier League after beating West Bromwich Albion, 2-0, on Saturday for its seventh win in eight matches.
snippet: Manchester United will enter 2013 with a 7-point lead in the Premier League after beating West Bromwich Albion, 2-0, on Saturday for its seventh win in eight matches.
